title: You’re the Third Heroine To Say She Came From the Future To Save Me - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Shounen
author: Hisumi   氷純
description:
'In half a month we will be lovers, but you will die shortly after that happens.'
A sudden confession from Sasashino, who sits in the seat next to him, stirs Tomoe's heart. But she also told him when he will die?! 
But that's not all: this is the third time he has heard this line!>
